name: Azure End To End Data Pipeline
description: Developed an end-to-end Azure data pipeline using Azure Data Factory, Databricks (PySpark), and Synapse Analytics following the Medallion architecture.

name: Real-Time Stock Market Data Pipeline using Kafka & AWS
description: Built a real-time streaming data pipeline using Apache Kafka on AWS EC2, with Python producers and consumers processing stock market data.

name: COVID-19 Data Analysis Dashboard
description: Built an interactive COVID-19 analysis dashboard using Azure Data Studio (SQL) for data transformation and Tableau for visualization, with preprocessing in Excel.
